title: MTB Megastar Alan Hatherly to Take on WorldTour Roadies with Jayco-AlUla
content:
Cross country world champion to mix disciplines in two-year deal with Aussie road team and Giant Factory Racing.

Read the full article at MTB Megastar Alan Hatherly to Take on WorldTour Roadies with Jayco-AlUla on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
